page.title: 14NEW HARBOUR OR BREAKWATER?
page.content: At the moment there is not enough room in the harbour at Symbister for all the Whalsay boats.Some of the purse net boats have to tie up at Lerwick because the water at the pier is not deep enough. The breakwater was built in 1980,made out of rubble stones.They are maybe going to make it into a pier and put a new breakwater at Symbister or there may be a brand new harbour made at the North Voe. No decisions have yet been made and whatever happens will be up to the government giving money for the work to be done.
